name: Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURTHOUSE, Respondent

parties: Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURTHOUSE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of September, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
5 A.3d 212
Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURTHOUSE, Respondent.
No. 91 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 27, 2010.
